events.description: Andrew Benintendi homers (2) on a fly ball to right center field.
Tim Anderson strikes out swinging. 1 out

Edouard Julien singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Andrew Benintendi. Edouard Julien to 2nd. Edouard Julien advances to 2nd, on a missed catch error by second baseman Elvis Andrus, assist to left fielder Andrew Benintendi.
Alex Kirilloff homers (8) on a fly ball to right center field. Edouard Julien scores.
